description: This file defines a React context and hooks for theme management, specifically providing and consuming a theme called OceanProfessionalTheme within a React application.

methods.name: useTheme
methods.description: Custom React hook to access the current theme context, ensuring it is used within a ThemeProvider.

methods.name: ThemeProvider
methods.description: React functional component that provides the theme context to its children using React's Context API and useMemo for performance optimization.
